address-book.you-can-use-the-address-book-to-store-a-: You can use the address book to store a label for your own accounts and others you frequently transact with, which are visible throughout the application.

app.incoming-transaction-s-found-set-to-be-r: Incoming transaction(s) found - Set to be received manually
app.invalid-nano-account-or-transaction-hash: Invalid Nano account or transaction hash!
app.new-incoming-transaction-s-unlock-the-wa: New incoming transaction(s) - Unlock the wallet to receive
app.there-was-an-issue-retrieving-the-latest: There was an issue retrieving the latest fiat price.
app.wallet-locked-after-x-minutes-of-inactiv: Wallet locked after {{minutes}} minute(s) of inactivity
app.wallet-server-settings-is-set-to-offline: Wallet server settings is set to offline mode. Please change server first!

api-server.title: API Server
api-server.tooltip: This has to be a valid Nano RPC endpoint or an API compliant with it.

auth-header.title: Auth Header
auth-header.tooltip: This has to be a valid Authorization header.

clear-work-cache.title: Clear Work Cache
clear-work-cache.tooltip: This will delete all locally cached Proof of Work values

default-representative.placeholder: Leave blank to use a recommended one
default-representative.title: Default Representative
default-representative.tooltip: This representative will be used when creating the initial open block on a new account

delete-all-data.title: Delete ALL Data
delete-all-data.tooltip: This will delete ALL stored data and reset app settings, including your wallet, address book and more.

delete-wallet-data.title: Delete Wallet Data
delete-wallet-data.tooltip: This will delete all data related to your wallet (Your seed and accounts)

lock-after-inactivity.title: Lock After Inactivity
lock-after-inactivity.tooltip: Change if your wallet should be locked automatically after you have not interacted with it for a certain period of time

min-receive.title: Min Receive
min-receive.tooltip: Minimum NANO amount to receive. Transactions below this amount will be ignored by the wallet both for receiving and in the transaction list.  Set to blank or 0 to accept all transactions.

pow-multiplier.title: PoW Multiplier
pow-multiplier.tooltip: Optional increased work for transaction priority during network saturation. Overrides both default SEND 1x and RECEIVE 1/64x difficulties.

pow-source.title: PoW Source
pow-source.tooltip: Change how Proof of Work for your blocks are generated.

server-configuration.title: Server Configuration
server-configuration.tooltip: Change which server is used to communicate with the Nano network

wallet-storage.title: Wallet Storage
wallet-storage.tooltip: Change where your wallet is stored.  If you select none, your wallet is reset every time you reload.

websocket-server.note: Note: Since this server only notifies about new transactions, most of the wallet functions fine without it.
websocket-server.title: WebSocket Server
websocket-server.tooltip: This has to be a Nano Node Websocket or a WebSocket API compliant with it.

work-server.title: Work Server
work-server.tooltip: This has to be a valid Nano Work Server endpoint or an API compliant with it.

configure-wallet.64-or-128-hex-character-nano-expanded-pr: 64 or 128 hex character Nano Expanded Private Key

backupseed.it-is-the-master-key-to-all-of-your-acco: It is the master key to all of your accounts, and the only way to recover your funds in an emergency.
backupseed.make-sure-to-write-down-your-seed: Make sure to write down your seed and/or mnemonic or save it somewhere safe.

configure-wallet.below-is-the-seed-and-mnemonic-backup: Below is the seed and mnemonic backup. You can use whichever you prefer in any other compatible wallet.
configure-wallet.enter-bip39-mnemonic: Enter your mnemonic generated from a Ledger device or certain multi-currency wallets. If it was generated in Nault, use "Nano Mnemonic" import type instead.
configure-wallet.enter-mnemonic: Enter your mnemonic generated from Nault or other Nano wallets. If it came from a Ledger device or certain multi-currency wallets, use "BIP39 Mnemonic" import type instead.
configure-wallet.enter-your-expanded-private-key-below: Enter your expanded private key below. These are rare, and are usually generated from multi-party cryptography magic.
configure-wallet.enter-your-nano-private-key-below: Enter your Nano private key below. These are not to be confused with Nano seeds, which are more common, and produce many private keys.
configure-wallet.enter-your-seed-from-any-nano-wallet-to-: Enter your seed from any Nano wallet to import it below.
configure-wallet.for-the-safety-of-your-funds-use-a-secur: For the safety of your funds, use a secure und unique password.
configure-wallet.i-have-securely-stored-the-seed-and-or-m: I have securely stored the seed and/or mnemonic
configure-wallet.if-wallet-file: If you have saved your wallet to a file using Nault before, use the button below to import it.
configure-wallet.if-you-lose-your-password-you-can-always: If you lose your password, you can always restore your wallet using your seed or mnemonic you were given.

ledger-device-locked.title: Ledger Device Locked
ledger-device-locked.unlock-your-ledger-device: Unlock your Ledger device, then press the button below to retry

ledger-device-not-connected.bluetooth-is-currently-not-supported-by-: Bluetooth is currently not supported by your browser, please use Google Chrome or get the desktop app:
ledger-device-not-connected.connect-your-ledger-device: Connect your Ledger device and make sure you have the Nano app installed and running, then press the button below.
ledger-device-not-connected.title: Ledger Device Not Connected

ledger-device-ready.press-the-import-button-below: Press the import button below to use your ledger wallet
ledger-device-ready.title: Ledger Device Ready

configure-wallet.make-sure-you-back-up-your-seed: Make sure you back up your seed, write it down, and keep it incredibly safe! All funds inside can be lost without it!
configure-wallet.make-sure-you-have-the-nano-app-installe: Make sure you have the Nano app installed and running on your Ledger, then click one of the buttons below to connect via either USB or Bluetooth.

note-for-ledger-device-owners.description: Entering the mnemonic of your Ledger on this or any other device may expose your private keys, and should only be used as an emergency option to access the wallet.
note-for-ledger-device-owners.title: Note for Ledger device owners:

configure-wallet.password-must-be-at-least-x-characters-l: Password must be at least {{numchars}} characters long
configure-wallet.press-the-ledger-status-bar-on-the-left-: Press the Ledger status bar on the left side to reload your Ledger when connecting or disconnecting it.
configure-wallet.required-only-if-the-bip39-seed-is-prote: Required only if the BIP39 seed is protected by a password or passphrase.
configure-wallet.successfully-created-new-wallet-do-not-l: Successfully created new wallet! Do not lose the seed/mnemonic!
configure-wallet.the-wallet-will-be-imported-as-a-single-: The wallet will be imported as a single private key for the account index you provide.

unsupported-browser.browser-does-not-support-usb-communicati: It looks like your browser does not support USB communication. Recommended browsers are: Chrome, Edge, Brave, or Opera.
unsupported-browser.note-ios-is-currently-unsupported: Note: iOS is currently unsupported. On Mac, use any browser other than Safari.
unsupported-browser.title: Unsupported Browser

wallet-configured.be-100-certain: Before going any further, be 100% certain you have backed up the seed to your current wallet!
wallet-configured.without-it-any-funds-unrecoverable: Without it, any funds you have will become completely unrecoverable!
wallet-configured.you-already-have-a-wallet-configured: You already have a wallet configured

configure-wallet.when-you-create-a-new-wallet-a-new-nano-: When you create a new wallet, a new Nano seed will be generated which can be used to create brand new accounts on the Nano network. Your Nano seed is the master key to all of your accounts and any money inside of them!
configure-wallet.your-password-is-used-to-encrypt-the-sen: Your password is used to encrypt the sensitive parts of your wallet when it is locked, which disables sending, receiving, creating accounts, and other operations.
configure-wallet.your-wallet-has-been-created: Your wallet has been created and you are ready to send and receive Nano!

export-nault-wallet.for-backup-purposes-always-store-the-see: For backup purposes, always store the seed and/or mnemonic from the "Backup Wallet" section above.
export-nault-wallet.if-you-forget-the-wallet-password: If you forget the wallet password used at the time of this export, you will NOT be able to restore your wallet.
export-nault-wallet.note-the-export-does-not-contain-your-ad: Note: The export does not contain your address book.
export-nault-wallet.scan-the-qr-code-on-any-device-to-import: Scan the QR code on any device to import your Nault wallet!
export-nault-wallet.title: Export Nault Wallet
export-nault-wallet.use-this-export-tool-to-simplify-wallet-: Use this export tool to simplify wallet transfer to other devices.
export-nault-wallet.you-can-also-import-your-wallet-by-using: You can also import your wallet by using the URL below.
export-nault-wallet.you-need-to-set-a-secure-wallet-password: You need to set a secure wallet password before you can use this export tool.
export-nault-wallet.your-data-will-be-encrypted-with-your-wa: Your data will be encrypted with your wallet's password, and then can be imported into Nault on any device!

manage-wallet.password-must-be-at-least-x-characters-l: Password must be at least {{chars}} characters long
manage-wallet.to-backup-your-wallet-mnemonic-phrase-cl: To backup your wallet mnemonic phrase click here:
manage-wallet.to-backup-your-wallet-seed-click-here: To backup your wallet seed click here:

navigation.attempting-to-connect-to-nano-node: Attempting to connect to Nano node
navigation.contribute-to-this-wallet-with-a-custom-: Contribute to this wallet with a custom donation!
navigation.search-for-an-account-or-block-hash: Search for an account or block hash
navigation.select-a-server-to-interact-with-the-net: Select a server to interact with the network
navigation.unable-to-connect-to-the-server: Unable to connect to the server

representatives.none-of-your-accounts-have-delegated-any: None of your accounts have delegated any voting weight yet, you must receive a transaction to change your representative!
representatives.representatives-participate-in-the-nano-: Representatives participate in the Nano consensus protocol on your behalf. You can change them at any time.

wallet-widget.unlock-the-device-then-click-here: Unlock the device, then click here:

welcome.a-full-security-guide-is-found-here: A full security guide is found here.
welcome.a-secure-open-source-wallet-for-nano: A secure open source wallet for Nano
welcome.all-sensitive-operations-happen-in-your-: All sensitive operations happen in your browser only - your seed and private keys are never sent across your network, or stored on any server in any format. (So there is no need for server-based authentication measures such as 2FA).
welcome.because-no-information-is-ever-stored-on: Because no information is ever stored on a server, there is no account to login to or email address required. Create as many wallets as you want and switch between them easily.
welcome.send-and-receive-nano-from-any-device-us: Send and receive Nano from any device using the web wallet or use the desktop wallet available for Windows/Mac/Linux.
welcome.store-labels-for-your-friends-and-your-o: Store labels for your friends and your own accounts in the address book, track your balances in your local currency, and more!
welcome.to-get-started-choose-an-option-below-to: To get started, choose an option below to configure your wallet
welcome.welcome-back-it-looks-like-your-wallet-i: Welcome back! It looks like your wallet is already configured.
